abstract.original_text: We report the first 7,755 patients with confirmed COVID-19 in Korea as of March 13, 2020. A total of 66 deaths were identified, resulting case fatality proportion of 0.9%. Older people, and those with coexisting medical conditions were at risk for fatal outcomes. The highest number of cases were from Daegu, followed by Gyeongbuk, with elevated age-stratified case fatality.

sentences.segment_text: We report the first 7,755 patients with confirmed COVID-19 in Korea as of March 13 , 2020 .
A total of 66 deaths were identified ,
Older people , and those with coexisting medical conditions were at risk for fatal outcomes .
The highest number of cases were from Daegu ,
followed by Gyeongbuk , with elevated age-stratified case fatality .

abstract.original_text: This summary may help to understand the disease dynamics in the early phase of COVID-19 outbreak, therefore, to guide future public health measures.
